page.title: 12Oldmeldrum Sports Gala Day
page.content: Each year for the past 50 years on the third weekend in June a festival of highland games - Oldmeldrum Sports - has been held in the Pleasure Park, Oldmeldrum. Pipe bands alternate with Scottish country dance contests, sideshows compete for spectators' attention with skydivers landing in the centre of the field; and there is always a lengthy tug-o'-war contest for men and women which draws in teams from all around Aberdeenshire. The 'Sports' are run by a group of local businessmen and farmers who volunteer their services and tend to hold office for life. A current favourite television or entertainment star performs the opening ceremony and has tea in the officials pavilion while other revellers refresh themseles in the giant tea marquee, used at night for the annual Sports Dance.
